title: Stochastic Optimization
description: An introduction to sequential decision making under uncertainty.  Much of the course is devoted to the theoretical, modeling, and computational aspects of Markov decision processes.

prerequisites: ISYE 6762 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 6762 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
